entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 11.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
